comment.author: 25767425@N02
comment._content:
I'm a collector of mens vintage clothing (especially 1940s neckwear) so I'm probably the only one to notice this, but he (Harry Betts) is wearing the exact same necktie as this gentleman (not 100% for sure it's Stan Kenton). Since tens of thousands of designs and patterns were created I'd say the chances of them both buying the same tie are slim. I wager that one borrowed it from the other.

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5354177977/in/photostream/]

comment.author: 25767425@N02
comment._content: Since they both played for Stan Kenton it was probably a necktie that everyone in the orchestra wore as part of their band uniform or something like that.
